item.title: ## Development Tasks & Notes (2025-06-02)
item.description: Development Tasks & Notes (2025-06-02) Backend Remove (oauth provider id, oauth sub) idx in favor of opf(scopes) Deploy to staging ➡️ k8wiring Test in staging Deploy to production Known Issues “Tap to copy” should probably be pressable Add zip share button (location share) Level Up pre-entry Update app icon Cashapp Offer What do we do if we can’t get fluent to raise caps $1000k gross profit $180k playful share after base pay Explain internally - Ad creation cool hire a Additional Notes PP tax Technical Stack IntelliKit.
item.content:
Development Tasks & Notes (2025-06-02)

Backend

  • Remove (oauth provider id, oauth sub) idx in favor of opf(scopes)
  • Deploy to staging ➡️ k8wiring
  • Test in staging
  • Deploy to production

Known Issues

  • “Tap to copy” should probably be pressable
  • Add zip share button (location share)
  • Level Up pre-entry
  • Update app icon

Cashapp Offer

  • What do we do if we can’t get fluent to raise caps
  • $1000k gross profit
  • $180k playful share after base pay
  • Explain internally - Ad creation
  • cool hire a

Additional Notes

  • PP tax

Technical Stack

  • IntelliKit.ai
  • Pocketbook -> ATD -> Obsidian Personal site
  • OP: transparency

Note: The image shows a handwritten development/planning note with two boxed sections on the right side containing additional details. The text is organized in bullet points and sections with some arrows indicating relationships or flow.

item.title: ## Appuser Effects & Earn Sources Implementation (2023-05-30)
item.description: Appuser Effects & Earn Sources Implementation (2023-05-30) Appuser Effect Structure Appuser Effect ├── Appuser └── Effect Appusers::Jobs::Archive - deletes records (AppuserEffects) Appusers::AppuserSpecialOffers::{Claim, process} both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation AppuserEffects::Jobs::Compare marks appuser effects as complete Playfab::Appusers::Addsc::CreateRewards shows usage of AppuserEffect + Effect to create bonus rewards Effect should be rewardable.stub Earn Sources Fluent Prolege offers Prolege Magic Receipts Prolege surveys Revu Koshkick/Besitos Kiuder Process Flow Diagrams Post Flow: POST (send code) → Find or Create (Otto 24-hour Effect) → Find or Create appuser active effect (Dotted line shows connection between steps)
item.content:
Appuser Effects & Earn Sources Implementation (2023-05-30)

Appuser Effect Structure

Appuser Effect
├── Appuser
└── Effect

  • Appusers::Jobs::Archive - deletes records (AppuserEffects)

  • Appusers::AppuserSpecialOffers::{Claim, process} both offer examples of AppuserEffect creation

  • AppuserEffects::Jobs::Compare marks appuser effects as complete

  • Playfab::Appusers::Addsc::CreateRewards shows usage of AppuserEffect + Effect to create bonus rewards

    • Effect should be rewardable.stub

Earn Sources

  • Fluent
  • Prolege offers
  • Prolege Magic Receipts
  • Prolege surveys
  • Revu
  • Koshkick/Besitos
  • Kiuder

Process Flow Diagrams

  1. Post Flow:
POST (send code) → Find or Create (Otto 24-hour Effect) → Find or Create appuser active effect

(Dotted line shows connection between steps)

  1. Earn Source Flow:
Receive Earn Source Event → Appusers::AppuserEffects::Apply Earn Modifiers (reward, appuser)
↓
[BOOST!]
↓
Add another w2o reward record

Note: “BOOST!” appears in a box/rectangle in the original diagram

item.title: ## Technical Planning Notes - 2024-10-22
item.description: Technical Planning Notes - 2024-10-22 Safeguards By Default Physical Rewards: Test Attribution Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase) App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam: What are our goals exactly Here is what we provide summary Send Adam credentials.enc.yml changes for [feat/social-auth] Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big) Note: Push Dir RTM, then backbone client rocks (written in blue box at top) Version Notes v2.3.4 Filter out Recently Played (90-days) ⭐
item.content:
Technical Planning Notes - 2024-10-22

Safeguards By Default

Physical Rewards:

  • Test Attribution
  • Push Up Social Auth (Staging + Client Builds + Firebase)
  • App Usage Tracking Sync w/ Adam:
    • What are our goals exactly
    • Here is what we provide summary
  • Send Adam credentials.enc.yml changes for [feat/social-auth]
  • Onboarding Wizard v2 (Quick vs Big)

Note: Push Dir RTM, then backbone client rocks (written in blue box at top)

Version Notes

v2.3.4 Filter out Recently Played (90-days) ⭐

UserWise

  • Mongo 5 -> 6
    • Staging 0Production
  • Forward Changes >_<
  • Works during?
  • Global Remote Config
  • Works Job (time)!
  • Push Notifications (scheduled send)

Note: “AUG” written in blue box

PerpetFin Call Notes:

  • Q1/Q2 for LiveOps? UW then?
  • GCP??? Do we host for them?
  • How do we integrate UW <=> PT
    • UW would be a nice frontend
    • They would need custom features
  • Start SaaS -> Self-Hosted (pre-live)

PubSub Notes

  • PubSub Realtime Flow
  • They provide segments to us.

Note: “BCP” written in blue box at bottom

*Format Notes:

  • Date marked as 2024-10-22 in top right corner
  • Several boxes and diagrams throughout
  • Blue highlighting/boxes used for emphasis
  • Star symbol used for emphasis on one item
  • Arrows indicating flow/progression*

item.title: ## Product Updates & Task Management Notes
item.description: Product Updates & Task Management Notes Playful Features v2.3.2 [Authorization] Live v2.3.3 [Social Auth] Test / Prod ☐ v2.3.4 (App Usage Offer Filtering) ☐ v2.3.5 (Onboarding Wizard v2) Social Auth O-merge or built 4 test track [List of crossed out items appearing to be login/signup related methods] Userwise Upgrade to (Prod) ☐ Frontend Change Sync? ☐ Workers dying ☐ Global Remote Config ☐ Worker Job (TIME Advancement) ☐ Push Notifications (Scheduled Send) ☐ Update segment concrete to use cube & time ☐ Query Optimizations ☐ Journey Step Pathing (CLIQAT) ☐ Journey Step Event Template ☐ Enable Strack ☐ ARM Notes & Reminders Search RPI focus: get client ROAs Visibility & Observability for Business Analytics Servers!
item.content:
Product Updates & Task Management Notes

  • v2.3.3 [Social Auth] Test / Prod
  • ☐ v2.3.4 (App Usage Offer Filtering)
  • ☐ v2.3.5 (Onboarding Wizard v2)

Social Auth

O-merge or built 4 test track

[List of crossed out items appearing to be login/signup related methods]

Userwise

  • Upgrade to (Prod)
  • ☐ Frontend Change Sync?
  • ☐ Workers dying
  • ☐ Global Remote Config
  • ☐ Worker Job (TIME Advancement)
  • ☐ Push Notifications (Scheduled Send)
  • ☐ Update segment concrete to use cube & time
  • ☐ Query Optimizations
  • ☐ Journey Step Pathing (CLIQAT)

  • ☐ Enable Strack
  • ☐ ARM

Notes & Reminders

  • Search RPI focus: get client ROAs
  • Visibility & Observability for Business Analytics
  • Servers! IAP changes to beta up cred tests
  • Get $200 by spending $175
  • Client ROAs means pushing a focus on IAPs

Additional Notes

  • TikTok + FB + Apps Huya deep link data defense
  • Big Updates Now then Analytics revamp

[Note: Contains various diagrams and boxes with arrows and connecting lines throughout]

item.title: ## LED Strip Simulator and App Playtime Tracking System
item.description: LED Strip Simulator and App Playtime Tracking System System Overview MQTT -> RaspPi/LED Controller -> LED Strip Computer/Server connected to MQTT 5v External power supply shown with dotted lines Components A16Z Speed Run calculations: 10 x 12 12/2 16-H R2=24/4 Events LED Strip Simulator? Note: Handwriting Pic -> upload Tags Configuration interval = “daily” / “hourly” package-name = "" Workers AppPlayTimeSchedulerWorker AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker Worker Details Sched (run every) Worker hour Flow Diagram Remote Worker -> Stored Prefs interval package-name If interval changes -> Tracking Worker CancelUniqueWork(“PRAppPlayTimeTracker”) + enqueueUniqueWork AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker Every 5 minutes Run @ interval (daily) Query for this every $ + day Query considerations: Query last processed?
item.content:
LED Strip Simulator and App Playtime Tracking System

System Overview

  • MQTT -> RaspPi/LED Controller -> LED Strip
  • Computer/Server connected to MQTT
  • 5v External power supply shown with dotted lines

Components

  • A16Z Speed Run calculations:
    • 10 x 12
    • 12/2
    • 16-H
    • R2=24/4

Events

  • LED Strip Simulator?
    • Note: Handwriting
    • Pic -> upload
    • Tags

Configuration

  • interval = “daily” / “hourly”
  • package-name = ""

Workers

  • AppPlayTimeSchedulerWorker
  • AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

Worker Details

Sched (run every)
Worker hour

Flow Diagram

  • Remote Worker -> Stored Prefs
    • interval
    • package-name
  • If interval changes -> Tracking Worker
  • CancelUniqueWork(“PRAppPlayTimeTracker”) + enqueueUniqueWork

AppPlayTimeTrackingWorker

  • Every 5 minutes
  • Run @ interval (daily)
  • Query for this every $ + day
  • Query considerations:
    • Query last processed?
    • If hourly -> has it been >= 1 hour?
    • If daily -> has it been >= 1 day?

Notes

  • “Hmm… Feeling good”
  • “Take CPI then spread it out”

Amplitude Events

  • √2 3.184

Note: Diagram shows various interconnected boxes and arrows representing system flow and worker relationships

item.title: ## Project Notes: Tuned Global & Scoring System Updates
item.description: Project Notes: Tuned Global & Scoring System Updates Call Notes: Tuned Global Apps to see: Search/Rec APIs Existing: Many object search (Rec contextual to store) Upcoming: AltDoc shutting us off (traffic →) update package from uber Mega. AppLovin Rewarded Videos Ad Scoring Systems: Wilson scoring system ↓ Elastic Scoring system Questions/Issues: TikTok in store??? 3% margin to user 478 for us 00 Music Integration: Universal Music Group in Tuned Catalogue Music in Demo Pre-tagging Tuned Global for Cold Start: Playful Rewards (userwise) Playful Rhythm Implementation Notes: per hour all packages Android only Figures Out: issue with guided install UW optimizations + segment optimizations PR Android app time rollup tracking Rhythm?
item.content:

Music Integration:

Universal Music Group
in Tuned Catalogue
Music in Demo

Pre-tagging Tuned Global for Cold Start:

Playful Rewards
(userwise)
Playful Rhythm

Figures Out:

item.title: ## Kiwi Implementation Tasks - May 29, 2025
item.description: Kiwi Implementation Tasks - May 29, 2025 General ToDo Remove davis@usermite.io lucky/kiwi GCP Auth Screen AASide/Playtime SDK upgrade to 3.1.0: Playful Rewards [notation: RocketBook->Tape RocketBook->markdown -> obsidian] Server ToDo Save new onboarding kiwi Data Add promo code endpoint Add 10% boost functionality Swap remaining keys Update Applovin to support kiwi Add new Kiwi Content Sections Game Section Horizontal Hotlink Section Level up Game Overview Client ToDo Update app-id to be kiwi Update DoB + Gender to match fetch Update last name autofill Note: This appears to be a development task list with three main sections (General, Server, and Client) related to implementing Kiwi features and updates.
item.content:
Kiwi Implementation Tasks - May 29, 2025

General ToDo

  • Remove davis@usermite.io lucky/kiwi GCP Auth Screen
  • AASide/Playtime SDK upgrade to 3.1.0: Playful Rewards

[notation: RocketBook->Tape RocketBook->markdown -> obsidian]

Server ToDo

  • Save new onboarding kiwi Data
  • Add promo code endpoint
  • Add 10% boost functionality
  • Swap remaining keys
  • Update Applovin to support kiwi
  • Add new Kiwi Content Sections
    • Game Section Horizontal
    • Hotlink Section
  • Level up Game Overview

Client ToDo

  • Update app-id to be kiwi
  • Update DoB + Gender to match fetch
  • Update last name autofill

Note: This appears to be a development task list with three main sections (General, Server, and Client) related to implementing Kiwi features and updates. All checkboxes appear to be empty, indicating these are pending tasks.
